questions.text: Q1. Is your enterprise payment method P - Direct Deposit ACH?

options.label: Yes
options.description: Your enterprise uses Direct Deposit ACH (code P).

options.label: No
options.description: Your enterprise does not use Direct Deposit ACH (code P).

questions.text: Please list the house bank names used for ACH payments.
Please provide the ACH file specification used by your bank.
Q2. Is your enterprise payment method Q - Physical Check?

options.label: Yes
options.description: Your enterprise uses Physical Checks (code Q).

options.label: No
options.description: Your enterprise does not use Physical Checks (code Q).

questions.text: What is the volume of your physical payroll checks?
Please provide the check number range used for physical checks.
Q3. Is your enterprise payment method K - Pay Card (Debit Card)?

options.label: Yes
options.description: Your enterprise uses Pay Cards / Debit Cards (code K).

options.label: No
options.description: Your enterprise does not use Pay Cards / Debit Cards (code K).

questions.text: Q4. Is your enterprise payment method M - Manual / Off-cycle Check?

options.label: Yes
options.description: Your enterprise uses Manual / Off-cycle Checks (code M).

options.label: No
options.description: Your enterprise does not use Manual / Off-cycle Checks (code M).

questions.text: We recommend NOT to have the pre-note process. There is a check replacement process that can be used if the bank transfer fails due to an invalid bank account. Please confirm you agree NOT to have the pre-note process with SAP.

options.label: Yes, I confirm we will not use the pre-note process.
No, we prefer to retain the pre-note process.
